title: Conditional List
description:
`minecraft:conditional_list` Places the first suitable feature within a collection.
These conditional features will be evaluated in order.
Succeeds if: A condition is successfully resolved.
Fails if: No condition is successfully resolved.
Example use: assigning a feature to an expression

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The name of this feature in the form `namespace_name:feature_name`. `feature_name` must match the filename.

conditional_features.title: Conditional Features
conditional_features.description: Array of Features, and their associated Conditions, for attempted placement. These features will be evaluated as ordered.

items.title: Conditional Feature
items.description: A Feature, and their associated Conditions, for attempted placement. These features will be evaluated as ordered.

early_out_scheme.title: Early out scheme
early_out_scheme.description: Denote whether placement should end on first successful placement or first passed condition.
